import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useLanguage } from '../context/LanguageContext'; import LanguageToggle from './LanguageToggle'; const Navbar = (props) => { const [flyout, setFlyout] = useState(false) const [mobileFlyout, setMobileFlyout] = useState(false) const [placeOfElement, setPlaceOfElement] = useState(false) const [mobileMenu, setMobileMenu] = useState(false) const { t } = useLanguage(); useEffect(() => { if (!flyout) { setTimeout(() => { setPlaceOfElement(flyout) }, 200); } else { setPlaceOfElement(flyout) } }, [flyout]) return (
